question: SEBI has banned the Chairperson and promoters of which company from the Securities Market?
explanation:
Securities Exchange Board of India (SEBI) has banned the Future Retailâ€™s Chairman Kishore Biyani and other promoters from the securities market for one year.
They have been charged for indulging in insider trading in the shares of the company. SEBI has also imposed a fine of Rs 1 Crore each on the promoters and ordered them to pay back Rs 17.78 crore with interest.
